origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialSupportAPI.get_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of financial support policies on small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) based on loan data and policy type.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial support policy, e.g., SME_support, tax_relief.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of data analysis, e.g., loan_data, revenue_growth.'}, {'name': 'coveragePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The period for which the policy impact is analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'The detailed analysis of policy impact on SMEs.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialSupportAPI.get_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'SME_support', 'analysisType'是'loan_data', 'coveragePeriod'是'2022'.
